mapper.select: SELECT avatar, name, certification_state, self_desc FROM diyi_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

SELECT rel_date, name, avatar, certification_state, empower_sign_state, join_sign_state, maker_state, politic_state, nationality, levelofedu, email_address, idcard_no, due_date, phone_number, bank_card_no, bank_name, sub_bank_name, idcard_pic, idcard_pic_back, self_pic, idcard_copy, idcard_hand, idcard_back_hand, pic_verify, idcard_verify_status, idcard_verify_date, face_verify_status, face_verify_date, bank_card_verify_status, bank_card_verify_date, phone_number_verify_status, phone_number_verify_date, idcard_verify_type, manual_verify_name, manual_verify_desc, run_address, house_address, living_address, self_desc, shop_url, shop_user_name, apply_short_video, video_audit, video_audit_date, video_audit_person_id FROM diyi_maker WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1}

SELECT t5.id, t5.avatar, t5.name, t5.certification_state, t5.self_desc, t5.idcard_no, t5.phone_number, t5.bank_card_no, t5.bank_name, t5.apply_short_video, t5.create_time, t5.maker_state, (SELECT COUNT(t2.id) FROM diyi_worksheet t1 INNER JOIN diyi_worksheet_maker t2 ON t1.id = t2.worksheet_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.worksheet_maker_state = 'VALIDATION' AND t2.maker_id = t5.id) AS order_num, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t4.check_money), 0) FROM diyi_worksheet t3 INNER JOIN diyi_worksheet_maker t4 ON t3.id = t4.worksheet_id WHERE t3.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.is_deleted = 0 AND t4.worksheet_maker_state = 'VALIDATION' AND t4.maker_id = t5.id) AS income, IF(t5.bank_card_verify_status = 'VERIFYPASS', TRUE, FALSE) AS bool_real_name_verify, (SELECT IF(paper_agreement_url IS NOT NULL AND paper_agreement_url <> '', paper_agreement_url, online_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = t5.id AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT') AS platform_join_contract, (SELECT IF(paper_agreement_url IS NOT NULL AND paper_agreement_url <> '', paper_agreement_url, online_agreement_url) FROM diyi_agreement WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND maker_id = t5.id AND sign_state = 'SIGNED' AND audit_state = 'APPROVED' AND agreement_type = 'MAKERPOWERATTORNEY') AS license_agreement FROM diyi_maker t5 WHERE t5.is_deleted = 0 AND t5.id = #{param1}

SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.phone_number, t1.idcard_no, t1.idcard_pic, t1.idcard_pic_back, t1.idcard_hand, t1.idcard_back_hand FROM diyi_maker t1
INNER JOIN diyi_maker_enterprise t2 ON t1.id = t2.maker_id AND t2.relationship_type = 'RELEVANCE' AND t2.is_deleted = 0
WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.phone_number_verify_status = 'VERIFYPASS'
AND t2.enterprise_id = #{param1}
AND t1.name LIKE concat('%', #{param2.name}, '%')
AND t1.phone_number LIKE concat('%', #{param2.phoneNumber}, '%')
AND t1.idcard_no LIKE concat('%', #{param2.idcardNo}, '%')
SELECT t1.name FROM diyi_maker t1 INNER JOIN diyi_pay_maker t2 ON t1.id = t2.maker_id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.is_deleted = 0 AND t2.id = #{param1}
